description: Try our easy to follow Crunchie Ice Cream Choc Chip Cookie Sandwich recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crunchie Ice Cream Choc Chip Cookie Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: COMBINE the ice cream and Crunchie and then chill until firm.
CREAM together butter and sugars until light and fluffy. Whisk in egg and vanilla. Stir in sifted flours and the chocolate.
ROLL a tablespoonful of mixture into a ball and place on a greased baking tray, pressing down slightly. Repeat with remaining mixture, allowing room for spreading.
BAKE in a moderate oven 180oC for 15 minutes or until cooked. Cool on a wire rack. Store in an airtight container until required.
TOP a cookie with a scoop of ice cream, then sandwich together. Repeat with remaining cookies and ice cream. Place onto serving plates and drizzle with melted chocolate. Serve immediately
